snippet.title: Wreckfest - Tournament Update & Racing Heroes Car Pack Trailer | PS4
snippet.description:
Wreckfest gets a massive FREE update and the brand new Racing Heroes Car Pack, included in the Season Pass #2, is out today as well!

The Free Update includes:
- A new Tournament Season: Racing Heroes
- A new track containing a circuit track and a derby arena
- Unique rewards
- New Challenges

The Car Pack includes:
- Raven: This rare breed of true 80s American muscle shreds the opposition with raw power.
- Stellar: The legendary rally missile is equally at home on tight gravel corners and asphalt straights.
- Speedie: This plucky little car punches above its weight, outfoxing the competition!

The Racing Heroes Car Pack is the second Car Pack and part of the Season Pass #2, which includes 12 new cars, spread across four DLCs. This new content will be released step by step.
---
Website: https://order.wreckfestgame.com/
Discord: https://discord.gg/wreckfest
Steam: http://n.thq.com/1OE730r9VCi

#Wreckfest #DriveHardDieLast
